summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein. It involves multiple individuals from financial institutions discussing the setup of global deliveries for accounts associated with Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email correspondence regarding the transfer of assets related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Vahe Stepanian and Janet E. Young are key figures in the asset transfer process.
Multiple individuals from J.P. Morgan and Deutsche Bank are involved in the discussions.
The email indicates a structured approach to managing Epstein's financial accounts.
The correspondence is marked as confidential under federal rules.
